sub_title: Senior Materials Scientist | Silicon Anodes| Light-Energy Materials | Li-ion Batteries | Materials Characterization | Optical Spectroscopy | Materials Chemistry
summary:
- Experience in scaling up the technologies from lab scale to pilot line scale.
-Experience in leading projects and making strategies to achieve goals through work-packages.
- Experience in process design and optimization.
-Experience in understanding various cell chemistries for Li-ion batteries.
-10+ years of experience in the synthesis of various nanomaterials.
- 6 years of experience in optical spectroscopy measurements.
- Materials Characterization Expert with more than 11 years of experience in various industries.
- 1 year of experience in battery design at cell and pack level.
- 3 years of experience in Reliance Industries  Limited as a R&D engineer working on performance textiles.
- Expertise in powder metallurgy techniques like high-energy ball milling, sintering, etc.
- Expertise in the synthesis of application-specific nanomaterials. 
- Developed a dust and pollen resistant coating technology 'Protector Fabric' commercialized by Reliance Industries Limited.
- Experience in project management from the initial design of the product to commercialization. 
- Experience with Optical Spectroscopy, STEM, XRD, SEM, AFM, Raman etc.
- Experience in grant writing, technical and non-technical report writing.
-Experience in leading groups of Master/ PhD stage students and colleagues.
- Extensive experience on single dot spectroscopy, AFM and Raman spectroscopy.
- Wrote 29 papers published in international high-impact journals as first, corresponding and co-author.
- Applied 2 patents on synthesis technologies ( Indian patent).

please feel free to reach out to me on ankitcct@gmail.com for exciting opportunities.

awards.title: AWSAR Award
awards.description: Augmenting Writing Skills for Articulating Research (AWSAR)" is an initiative that aims to disseminate Indian research stories among the masses in an easy to understand and interesting format to a common man. It is an initiative to make science popular among young students and non-science audience. In Total 100 scholars, pan-India were selected for the award.
awards.issuer: Department of Science and Technology, Government of India

awards.title: Conference Grant to attend International Workshop on Advanced Materials 2019 at UAE
awards.description: A conference grant of 250$ was awarded to me to attend and present my work at 'International Workshop on Advanced Materials 2019' at Ras Al Khaimah Centre for Advanced Materials, RAK, United Arab Emirates by Shantou University, China.

awards.title: China Government Scholarship 2018-19 jointly with MHRD, Government of India
awards.description: Under the joint program of Government of India and China, I have been awarded with 'Senior Scholar' Scholarship to pursue research in Shantou University, China.

awards.title: Travel grant by Tel Aviv University
awards.description: I was awarded a travel grant and accommodation assistance by Tel Aviv Univerisity Centre for Nanoscience and Nanotechnology to attend UK-Israel Workshop Summer School 2018 on Bio and Materials Research.
awards.issuer: Tel Aviv University, Tel Aviv, Israel

awards.title: G S Tendolkar award
awards.description: Reputed Prof. G S Tendolkar award has been given to my paper "Bandgap Engineering in Nanocrystalline Silicon by Mechanical Alloying" at PM17, New Delhi by PMAI, India. The award is given annually in the memory of Late Prof. G S Tendolkar to the best paper in the field of fundamentals of powder metallurgy.

authors.headline: Senior Materials Scientist | Silicon Anodes| Light-Energy Materials | Li-ion Batteries | Materials Characterization | Optical Spectroscopy | Materials Chemistry

profile_positions.description: I have started as a Materials Scientist in a growing  Li-ion battery company that is providing a unique silicon anode technology for high energy density & high power applications with longer cycle life.  I am leading several projects aiming understanding failure mechanism of the cells using advanced characterization techniques, new electrolytes development aiming fast charge applications, optimizing formation protocols for improving cycle life of the pouch cells and providing guidance to the process development team in improving QC methods and building new QC tools.
profile_positions.title: Materials Scientist

profile_positions.description: I have developed a sustainable and scalable mechanochemical technique to  synthesize high quality semiconductor nanocrystals. I am working on the project of development of spectral conversion foils that could convert the UV-blue and IR part of solar light into visible light. My work in these projects have helped scientific community in taking a significant leap in sustainable and environment- friendly synthesis of large quantities of nanocrystals having applications in solar cells, LEDs and spectral conversion layers. I have expertise on microscopic techniques or AFM correlated micro-PL spectroscopy and Micro-PL- Raman spectroscopy to study light-matter interaction at nanoscopic level. Besides, I have collaborations with other research groups on development of various functional alloys. During this period, I have mentored 2 Master students, 2 PhD students and 4 undergraduate students.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description: During this period, I have contributed towards development of efficient and sustainable recycling-reusing strategy of spent lithium ion batteries by combining artificial intelligence and my knowledge of materials science. I have authored one publication showing potential of machine learning algorithms in efficient optimization of electrodes in Lithium ion batteries. During my short stay, I mentioned Masters and undergraduate students and helped in designing various experiments to guide the research in the direction of sustainable battery packs for electrical vehicles.
profile_positions.title: Senior Scholar

company.name: Malaviya National Institute of Technology Jaipur

profile_positions.company: Malaviya National Institute of Technology Jaipur
profile_positions.description: I worked as a PhD student in Metallurgical and Materials Engineering department of MNIT, Jaipur.  I could successfully develop a novel mechanochemical synthesis technique to synthesize doped silicon nanocrystals in large quantities to be used in solar cells. I developed a low cost fabrication setup using Spray coating technology to fabricate 100% nanocrystalline Silicon  thin film solar cells. I have mentored 2 Masters and several undergraduate students during this period.  One project on precious metals extraction using hydrometallurgy is under patent evaluation. The work is also got published in repute journals and couple of patents.
profile_positions.title: Doctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
I had joined Reliance Industries Limited as Research Engineer. Then promoted to executive in R & D Lab. I was working on new product development using innovative nano-polymer based coatings for technical textiles. The design of experiments, conduction of lab and large scale trials , testing and preparation of SOPs were part of my work. I was involved in NABL ISO17025:2005 lab accreditation .
Few of successful products developed were commercialized by Reliance 'Only Vimal' brand, Nike, Levis etc. The most successful product was "Anti-Dust and Anti-pollen" fabric which is now commercialized by Only Vimal brand under the tag of "Protector". Oil spillage control fabric, controlled anti-mosquito net foe armed services etc were other successful projects.
profile_positions.title: R & D Executive

profile_positions.description: I have joined Reliance Textiles from 7th November 2011 for my M.Tech thesis work. Here, My work is to develop Anti-Dust Fabrics by Nanotechnology.
profile_positions.title: Research Trainee
